title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criterion below.
The response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes three of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes four of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes five of the criteria below.

stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criterion below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.
